::Balcknighmare::

after she gave order to the probes, she followed at Darkmouse and 
Killfest
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> 
> She watched as the bot put KitKat's body in storage. She turned to 
> Killfest. "Yeah sure. Follow me." She walked out of the room and 
> headed to the bridge.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Killfest::
> > 
> > Killfest frowns, looking around at all the bots saddened by 
> KitKat's 
> > death. He could understand a bit of regret at losing a leader, 
but 
> > this? This wasn't Predacon.
> > 
> > "I think we should put her in cryo storage for now," he says, 
> nodding 
> > to Demise. Demise walks to KitKat and lifts her in one of his 
huge 
> > clawed hands.
> > 
> > "KitKat shall be honored," he says, looking at DarkMouse, "But 
can 
> we 
> > get on with the codes?"
